title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate in Venezuela 2024
yAxis: GDP growth compared to previous year
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing GDP growth compared to previous year, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2016 to 2013.
Additionally, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2021 to 2019.
Conversely, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2019 to 2017.
Likewise, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2013 to 2011.
Conversely, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2017 to 2016.
gold: The statistic shows the growth in real GDP in Venezuela from between 2011 to 2018 , with projections up until 2021 . In 2018 , Venezuela 's real gross domestic product decreased by 18 percent compared to the previous year .
